p: The median of the CFU concentrations measured at days 3, 8, and 14 (Figure 2) of the no‐carbon suspensions (set A) was significantly similar ( p = 0.121) to the median of the corresponding total cell concentrations (Figure 1). In contrast, the median of the CFU concentrations of the 1% oil suspensions was significantly different compared to the median of the corresponding total cell concentrations ( p < 0.001).
